message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you take 40% - a fair deal considering the inflation.
Your share is losing value fast, Alice. Let's be practical. This is a fair split considering the circumstances.
Bob, my offer is decreasing, but so is the actual value of the money. I'm willing to meet in the middle, but it needs to be closer to my last offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  Every round costs us both. Agree now, and we each walk away with something substantial.
